text: Of course, it's nice to find a little naked woman in your pocket. You take her out, she smiles right away, delighted with the light, delighted to be yours. It's just warm in your hand. She has beautiful breasts, a cute little pubis like a nice ordinary creature. Oh, well, it's nice, but it's weird, oh weird, very, very weird. FIN Norwegian Anonymous
title: A gusto
author: nan Anónimo
